verses.verse: Put <S%G5279><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in mind <S%G5279><s%> to be in subjection to <S%G5293><s%> rulers <S%G746><s%>, to <S%G2532><s%> authorities <S%G1849><s%>, to be obedient <S%G3980><s%>, to be <S%G1511><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>,

to speak evil <S%G987><s%> of no man <S%G3367><s%>, not to be <S%G1511><s%> contentious <S%G269><s%>, to be gentle <S%G1933><s%>, showing <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> meekness <S%G4236><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> were <S%G1510><s%> foolish <S%G453><s%>, disobedient <S%G545><s%>, deceived <S%G4105><s%>, serving <S%G1398><s%> divers <S%G4164><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pleasures <S%G2237><s%>, living <S%G1236><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> malice <S%G2549><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> envy <S%G5355><s%>, hateful <S%G4767><s%>, hating <S%G3404><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the kindness <S%G5544><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his love <S%G5363><s%> toward man <S%G5363><s%>, appeared <S%G2014><s%>,

not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> done in <S%G1722><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> ourselves <S%G235><s%>, but according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> he saved <S%G4982><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the washing <S%G3067><s%> of regeneration <S%G3824><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> renewing <S%G342><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>,

which <S%G3739><s%> he poured <S%G1632><s%> out upon <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> richly <S%G4146><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%>, being justified <S%G1344><s%> by his <S%G1565><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, we might be made <S%G1096><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is the saying <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> concerning these things <S%G5130><s%> I desire <S%G1014><s%> that <S%G1226><s%> thou <S%G4571><s%> affirm confidently <S%G1226><s%>, to the end that <S%G2443><s%> they who have believed <S%G4100><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> may be careful <S%G5431><s%> to maintain <S%G4291><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>. These things <S%G5023><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> profitable <S%G5624><s%> unto men <S%G444><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> shun <S%G4026><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> questionings <S%G2214><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> genealogies <S%G1076><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> strifes <S%G2054><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fightings <S%G3163><s%> about law <S%G3544><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> unprofitable <S%G512><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> vain <S%G3152><s%>.
A factious <S%G141><s%> man <S%G444><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> a first <S%G1520><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> admonition <S%G3559><s%> refuse <S%G3868><s%>;
knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a one is perverted <S%G1612><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sinneth <S%G264><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> self-condemned <S%G843><s%>.

When <S%G3752><s%> I shall send <S%G3992><s%> Artemas <S%G734><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%>, give diligence <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Nicopolis <S%G3533><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> I have determined <S%G2919><s%> to winter <S%G3914><s%>.

Set forward <S%G4311><s%> Zenas <S%G2211><s%> the lawyer <S%G3544><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> on their journey <S%G4311><s%> diligently <S%G4709><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> be wanting <S%G3007><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G3129><s%> our people <S%G2251><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> to maintain <S%G4291><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> necessary <S%G316><s%> uses <S%G5532><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they be <S%G5600><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> unfruitful <S%G175><s%>.

All that are <S%G3956><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>. Salute <S%G782><s%> them that love <S%G5368><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>. Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.
